markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Undergrowth](/Rules.aspx?ID=616)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 514 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Light undergrowth is difficult terrain that allows a character to Take Cover, while heavy undergrowth is greater difficult terrain that provides cover automatically. Some sorts of undergrowth, such as thorns, are also hazardous terrain, and areas with plenty of twisting roots are uneven ground.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Undergrowth

Some sorts of undergrowth, such as thorns, are also hazardous terrain, and areas with plenty of twisting roots are uneven ground.
